name: primo s8
description: The 5MP Wide Camera Sensor of the Primo S8 helps you see wider than your normal vision and helps you capture eye catchy landscape shots.

name: PRIMO S8 MINI
description: How much RAM and Memory space do you actually need to call a phone perfect? We give you multiple memory choices with a whooping 64GB internal storage and yes, a dedicated MicroSD.

name: PRIMO GH11
description: Android 12 is featuring dynamic color capabilities that can transform your experience based on your wallpaper and responsive.

name: PRIMO RX8 MINI
description: Continuing the trend of its predecessor, the Primo RX8 mini has a slim 8.4mm frame with a glossy glass back which gives it a different aesthetic in hand feel. It comes in a glossy black color that all of you will love.

name: Oppo A17
description: Oppo A17 comes with 6.56 inches HD+ screen. It has a Full-View waterdrop notch design. The back camera is of dual 50+2 MP with LED flash, PDAF, depth sensor, HDR etc. and Full HD video recording.

name: Oppo A16e
description: Oppo A16e comes with 6.52 inches HD+ screen. It has a Full-View waterdrop notch design. The back camera is of single 13 MP with LED flash, PDAF, f/2.2 aperture etc. and Full HD video recording.

name: Oppo A33
description: Oppo A33 comes with 6.5 inches HD+ screen. It has a Full-View left punch-hole design. The front side is protected by a 3rd gen. Gorilla Glass. The back camera is of triple 13+2+2 MP with LED flash, PDAF, depth.

name: Oppo F21s Pro
description: Oppo F21s Pro comes with 6.43 inches Full HD+ AMOLED screen. It has a left punch-hole front camera design. The back camera is of triple 64+2+2 MP with PDAF, LED flash, f/1.7 aperture, microscope, depth.

name: Oppo A95
description: Oppo A95 comes with 6.43 inches Full HD+ AMOLED screen. It has a left punch-hole front camera design. The back camera is of triple 48+2+2 MP with depth sensor, dedicated macro lens, PDAF, LED flash etc.

name: Oppo R17 Pro
description: Oppo R17 Pro is a high-mid range smartphone priced 69,990 Tk. in Bangladesh upon its release. After analyzing its specs, we concluded that the closest competitor of it in Bangladesh would be OnePlus 6T.
